snippet.textDisplay: So many hours spent on this game (well, series in general). Donut Plains 3 with its sharp turns, broken bridges and jumping moles was one of the most memorable and harder tracks in the game. Mario Kart really is one of the most consistently great and fun video game series I can think of.
snippet.textOriginal: So many hours spent on this game (well, series in general). Donut Plains 3 with its sharp turns, broken bridges and jumping moles was one of the most memorable and harder tracks in the game. Mario Kart really is one of the most consistently great and fun video game series I can think of.

snippet.textDisplay:
Did not read your wall of text, buddy. But I guess it was full of insightful arguments about how I am so super not right and you have all the right to tell me that my live would not be worth living. 

Btw, this tune still sucks and I am happy to be able to write this. Welcome in 2018, where everyone on the internet is allowed to speak freely.

snippet.textDisplay:
Just satirising your sentence structure. And don't pretend you know everything, this tune means a lot to a lot of people. I'm sure you have some random, lesser known jingle or tune that the "majority" of people would dislike but since you had a good association or memory with it, you like it yourself.

If I took 10,000 people born between 1990-1995 in the United States that have a gaming background and put up a survey for the top 10,000 music tunes, I guarantee this would be in that 10,000. Watch yourself when you blindly say stuff like "You know that this tune wouldnt even rank in a top 10,000 list. " without any grounding - and don't BS me with saying "oh you set a limit or boundary so it doesn't count." because YOU didn't set a boundary when you boasted "blah blah no one ever will rate this in the top 10,000 blah blah". 

The most amazing part is that out of the thousands of videos SupraDarky has uploaded, you think it's justified to say "this tune is bad and everyone should think it's bad" and not expect any backlash like this. 

You wouldn't go to a Trump Support Rally with a picket that says Trump Is An Imbecile And You're All Wrong without expecting some backlash right? Same idea.

Your opinion doesn't represent the grand scale in any way and the fact that you open your mouth spewing that you know THIS ONE THING GUARANTEED NO QUESTION BECAUSE EVERYONE THINKS LIKE ME AND I'M SOOOO RIGHT, it only shows that your thinking capacity is on the other spectrum of that very scale. Tiny.

snippet.textDisplay: Forgot how cool this was. Loved battle mode music most myself. Fun fact but I was wondering why Bowser was in pain on the cover but I think donkey Kong or toad hit him with the red shell in the background lol damn ricochet

snippet.textDisplay: Soyo Oka's melodies are still some of my favourite on the SNES. It really is a shame she didn't do more because some of her works (i.e. SimCity) were incredibly beautiful.
snippet.textOriginal: Soyo Oka's melodies are still some of my favourite on the SNES. It really is a shame she didn't do more because some of her works (i.e. SimCity) were incredibly beautiful.

snippet.textDisplay: IKR Nintendo should give her more recognition
snippet.textOriginal: IKR Nintendo should give her more recognition
